website_summaries.verdict: Not your typical cast iron option, but made of dense material that can fast forward your workout.
pros: A perfect addition that can amp up your cardio routine or help you regain strength in joints and other areas
One of the lighter cast iron options available, this set is great for those who walk on a regular basis
Coated dumbells protect floors from dings and scuffs
cons: Reviews suggest there is an odor to the set that may distract from your workout

customer_reviews.title: THESE HAVE A TOXIC ODER that transfers to the skin as well. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: i don't like writing negative reviews but feel i must post this because of other questions asking if these SMELL. I purchased these unseen/unsmelled based upon the reviews. THESE HAVE A TOXIC SMELL that transferred to my hands. As a health 'nut' and professional I can not (personally) have materials like this in my space So i wanted to let you know. If you are sensitive these DO have a smell. I own other vinyl coated weights that do not smell.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Basic dumbells, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I chose these because reviewers of other products had noted weight discrepancies, or the things falling apart. So far these have been fine! One reviewer mentioned an odor, and I found that initially there was a very slight vinyl smell, but it has basically gone away over a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: openreels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are skinny - the right grip for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lion

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my uncle in a nursing home. He complained that he didn't have access to exercise equipment and wanted to work on upper arm strength. I asked what he thought he could handle and he said 5 lbs. He's in a wheelchair, so he is limited anyway, but he says these are just what he needs to keep his muscles from atrophying.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Holley

customer_reviews.title: Great for hands that are 4" wide or less
customer_reviews.text: I like 'em, they're comfortable to hold, the coating is solid, and they'll accommodate man hands. I think my glove size is large and these are just long enough to fit my grip perfectly, 1/2cm shorter and I would've had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron L.

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made, especially with regard to the relatively soft polymer coating that is easy on the hands and non-marring when the dumbbells are set down, or even when dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Weight is perfect on my scale and rubber is very durable as well.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, weighed them out as well just to make sure on weight. Feels good as if good good rubber coating, doesnt have any nasty smell like some reviews state. I bought them for an older gentleman who was working out with rocks. He absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: Package came fast and was here on time for my next workout. Vinyl coating is smoothing but provides the right grip for during a workout. Perfect light weight for walking and mixed cardio workouts.
customer_reviews.author: SarahWorth

customer_reviews.title: Great Weights!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Set! Exactly what I needed! I’ve gotten great results from their daily use! Prompt delivery! Extremely happy and satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Produxt
customer_reviews.text: My two year old likes to “workout” with me so I ordered him some weights. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: x0x01984

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Received today. They look good and feel good as in the pictures. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Grip is not smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. The hand grip on one weight is not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: WI Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Easy to grip and so I am able to do more reps within a set.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: ... little apprehensive ecause they were inexpensive but was very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive ecause they were inexpensive but was very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: betty lou fisher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good to work out with hand and other thing as well
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: I bought all 3 weights and am very satisfied. Actually
customer_reviews.text: I am in Occupational Therapy for right shoulder surgery and my therapist has me using 1, 2 and 3 pound weights. I bought all 3 weights and am very satisfied. Actually, I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price - exactly as described - just what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: D Barbano

customer_reviews.title: Smells like PLASTIC... Not toxic lol
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy and coated and cheap! What more do you expect... (Omitted a paragraph discussion the intricacies of dumbbell internal gearing, the polymeric composition of the space age coating, the microgravity tolerances of the even weight distribution around it's center of mass, the artisan hand crafted blacksmith build quality, and final the soulfulness of its feel) ...it's a "dumb"-bell
customer_reviews.author: No more reviews!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They're the perfect size & shape for hands.
customer_reviews.author: LatinaChristina

customer_reviews.title: comfortable grip
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my mom that is going thru some medical procedures and spends lots of time in bed so she can at least exercise her arms while she is laying in bed :)
customer_reviews.author: VYRI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far they’ve held up really well and look super nice. I’m happy 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Chandler F

product_meta.title: ZELUS 9lbs Deluxe Dumbbells Vinyl Coated Hex Hand Weights (Sold in Pair) with Non Slip Grip & Multi Weights Available
feature_bullets: CAST IRON CONSTRUCTION, our dumbbells are cast in one solid piece with strong resistance to deformation & wear. The vinyl coat helps protect your floor, reduces noise, and makes the dumbbells easy to clean
ULTRA-LONG SMOOTH HANDLE, our dumbbells provide ample space yet anti-skid using experiences for your hands, ultimate comfort guaranteed; vinyl coated handle keeps you from freezing hands in winter
HEX PLATE FOR STABILITY, enables upright storage and easy portability, perfect for dumbbell halos, standing dumbbell reverse fly, dumbbell romanian deadlifts etc

COLOR-CODED FOR CONVENIENCE, color coded dumbbells make it easier for users to distinguish different weights; 12 weight increments available; one purchase comes with 2 dumbbells so you can build your arm muscles together
BEST WORKOUT COMBINING CARDIO & STRENGTH, dumbbell exercises serve as both strength and cardio workouts, improving your muscle strength and flexibility
